email.incomingsupport.body1.en: A customer has sent the following info
email.incomingsupport.body1.translation: Kua tukuna e tētahi kiritaki te mōhiohio e whai ake nei

email.secret_link.subject.translation: I tukua e %{sender_email} tētahi karere huna ki a koe

email.secret_link.sent_you_secret.translation: i tuku i tētahi karere huna ki a koe:

email.secret_link.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.secret_link.link_works_once.translation: Ka mahi tēnei hononga kotahi wā anake. I muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

email.welcome.subject.en: Welcome to %{product_name} - Please verify your email

email.welcome.title.translation: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{product_name}!

email.welcome.verify_prompt.en: Please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
email.welcome.verify_prompt.translation: Tēnā manatokohia tō wāhitau īmēra mā te pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:

email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.translation: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:

email.welcome.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}. If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this message.
email.welcome.postscript.translation: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}. Mēnā kāore koe i te tūmanako i tēnei pōwhiri, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei karere.

email.password_request.request_notice.en: We received a request to reset your password for %{product_name}.
email.password_request.request_notice.translation: I whiwhi mātou i tētahi tono kia tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name}.

email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.translation: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:

email.password_request.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
email.password_request.ignore_notice.translation: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i te tautuhi anō kupuhipa, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei īmēra.

email.password_request.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.
email.password_request.postscript.translation: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}.

email.magic_link.request_notice.en: You requested a login link for your %{product_name} account.
email.magic_link.request_notice.translation: I tono koe i tētahi hononga takiuru mō tō pūkete %{product_name}.

email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.translation: Tāruatia rānei ka whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.magic_link.expiration_notice.en: This link will expire in 15 minutes.
email.magic_link.expiration_notice.translation: Ka pau tēnei hononga i roto i te 15 meneti.

email.magic_link.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request this link, you can safely ignore this email.
email.magic_link.ignore_notice.translation: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i tēnei hononga, ka taea e koe te karo i tēnei īmēra.

email.magic_link.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.
email.magic_link.postscript.translation: Tāpiritanga: I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}.

email.incoming_secret.subject.translation: Kua whiwhi koe i tētahi karere huna

email.incoming_secret.received_message.translation: Kua whiwhi koe i tētahi karere haumaru:

email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.en: Someone has sent you a secure message through %{display_domain}.
email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.translation: Kua tukuna e tētahi tētahi karere haumaru ki a koe mā %{display_domain}.

email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.en: To view this secret, click the link below:
email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.translation: Hei tiro i tēnei karere huna, pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:

email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.translation: Ka mahi tēnei hononga kotahi wā anake. I muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

email.secret_revealed.viewed_on.translation: I tirohia tō karere huna i %{date}.

email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.en: This is an automated notification. No action is required.
email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.translation: He pānui aunoa tēnei. Kāore he mahi e hiahiatia ana.

email.secret_revealed.manage_preferences.translation: Hei whakahaere i ō hiahia pānui:

email.expiration_warning.subject.en: Your secret link will expire soon
email.expiration_warning.subject.translation: Ka pau wawe tō hononga karere huna

email.expiration_warning.expires_in.en: Your secret link will expire in %{time_remaining}
email.expiration_warning.expires_in.translation: Ka pau tō hononga karere huna i roto i %{time_remaining}

email.expiration_warning.view_button.en: View your secret before it expires
email.expiration_warning.view_button.translation: Tirohia tō karere huna kia kore anō i pau

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.translation: I muri i te pauhanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna, ā, kāore e taea te whakaora.

email.expiration_warning.view_before_gon.translation: Tirohia kia kore anō i ngaro:

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.translation: I muri i te pauhanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

email.organization_invitation.subject.translation: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{organization_name}

email.organization_invitation.title.translation: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{organization_name}!

email.organization_invitation.body.en: %{inviter_email} has invited you to join "%{organization_name}" as %{role_description}.
email.organization_invitation.body.translation: Kua pōwhiri a %{inviter_email} i a koe ki te hono ki "%{organization_name}" hei %{role_description}.

email.organization_invitation.link_instr.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.organization_invitation.link_instr.translation: Tārua rānei me te whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.en: This invitation will expire in %{days} days.
email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.translation: Ka pau tēnei pōwhiri i roto i te %{days} rā.

email.organization_invitation.decline_in.en: If you don't want to join, you can simply ignore this email or decline the invitation.
email.organization_invitation.decline_in.translation: Mēnā kāore koe e hiahia ki te hono, ka taea e koe te karo noa i tēnei īmēra, te whakakāhore rānei i te pōwhiri.

email.organization_invitation.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{invited_email}. If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this message.
email.organization_invitation.postscript.translation: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{invited_email}. Mēnā kāore koe i te tūmanako i tēnei pōwhiri, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei karere.

email.password_changed.body.en: Your password for %{product_name} was changed on %{date} at %{time}.
email.password_changed.body.translation: I hurihia tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name} i %{date} i %{time}.

email.password_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password and contacting support.
email.password_changed.security_notice.translation: Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakaū i tō pūkete ināianei mā te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa me te whakapā atu ki te tautoko.

email.email_changed.body.en: The email address for your %{product_name} account was changed to %{new_email_masked} on %{date}.
email.email_changed.body.translation: I hurihia te wāhitau īmēra mō tō pūkete %{product_name} ki %{new_email_masked} i %{date}.

email.email_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please contact support immediately as your account may be compromised.
email.email_changed.security_notice.translation: Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakapā atu ki te tautoko ināianei, kei kino tō pūkete.

email.email_change_confirmation.body.en: Please verify this email address to complete the change for your %{product_name} account.
email.email_change_confirmation.body.translation: Tēnā manatokohia tēnei wāhitau īmēra kia oti te panoni mō tō pūkete %{product_name}.

email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.translation: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:

email.mfa_enabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was enabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
email.mfa_enabled.body.translation: I whakahohehia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date}.

email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.en: Your account is now more secure. You will need to enter a verification code from your authenticator app when signing in.
email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.translation: Kei te haumaru ake tō pūkete. Me whakauru e koe tētahi waehere manatoko mai i tō taupānga manatoko i te takiuru.

email.mfa_disabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was disabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
email.mfa_disabled.body.translation: I whakakāhoretia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date}.

email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.en: Your account is now less secure. If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately.
email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.translation: Kei te iti ake te haumaru o tō pūkete. Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakaū i tō pūkete ināianei.

email.new_login_alert.body.en: A new sign-in to your %{product_name} account was detected on %{date} at %{time}.
email.new_login_alert.body.translation: I kitea tētahi takiuru hou ki tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date} i %{time}.

email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.en: If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.
email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.translation: Mēnā kāore tēnei koe, kei kino pea tō pūkete.

email.member_removed.body.en: You have been removed from the organization "%{organization_name}" on %{product_name}.
email.member_removed.body.translation: Kua tangohia koe i te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" i %{product_name}.

email.role_changed.body.en: Your role in "%{organization_name}" has been changed from %{old_role} to %{new_role}.
email.role_changed.body.translation: Kua hurihia tō tūranga i "%{organization_name}" mai i %{old_role} ki %{new_role}.

email.organization_deleted.body.en: The organization "%{organization_name}" has been deleted from %{product_name}. All associated data has been removed.
email.organization_deleted.body.translation: Kua mukua te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" i %{product_name}. Kua tangohia ngā raraunga katoa e pā ana.

email.payment_receipt.body.en: Thank you for your payment. Here are your payment details:
email.payment_receipt.body.translation: Ngā mihi mō tō utu. Kei konei ō taipitopito utu:

email.payment_failed.body.en: We were unable to process your payment for %{product_name}. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.
email.payment_failed.body.translation: Kāore mātou i taea te tukatuka i tō utu mō %{product_name}. Tēnā whakahou i tō tikanga utu kia kore ai te whakamutuhanga ratonga.

email.trial_expiring.subject.translation: Ka pau tō whakamātautau %{product_name} i roto i %{days_remaining} rā

email.trial_expiring.title.translation: Kei Te Mutu Wawe Tō Whakamātautau

email.trial_expiring.body.en: Your free trial of %{product_name} will expire in %{days_remaining} days. Upgrade now to keep access to all features.
email.trial_expiring.body.translation: Ka pau tō whakamātautau koreutu o %{product_name} i roto i %{days_remaining} rā. Whakapai ake ināianei kia puritia te urunga ki ngā āhuatanga katoa.

email.subscription_changed.body.en: Your %{product_name} subscription has been changed from %{old_plan} to %{new_plan}.
email.subscription_changed.body.translation: Kua hurihia tō ohaurunga %{product_name} mai i %{old_plan} ki %{new_plan}.
